Mount1.name: Falcon
Mount1.description: An Omnium motorcycle mass-produced by Hykros. Low in emissions, quiet, and extremely cost-efficient. The best choice for Wanderers, but be careful while riding it.

Mount2.name: Chaser
Mount2.description: It is said that the original design took hints from the flying brooms in various fantasy novels, but R&D unanimously agreed that the design wasn't suitable for long-term ride and eventually settled on a standing vehicle.

item.name: Magnetic Rod
item.description:
This is not for hanging clothes out to dry!

An abandoned tower in the Rusty Belt. Is someone trying to put something on it?

item.name: Maglev Stalker
item.description:
It's not a vacuum robot!

The Vermin Brothers' cherished possession and possibly a future table riser. Low-probability drop from the Vermin Brothers.

Low-probability drop from Venomfang: Echidna in Vera: Sandstorm Grounds, and from Venomfang: Medusa, Venomfang: Stheno, and Venomfang: Euryale in Vera: Quicksand Belt.

Mount3.name: Omnium Beast VII
Mount3.description: A vehicle inspired by the pedal structure and motions of huge wild beasts. After intense debates among R&D, it was decided to retain the jolting that could capture the feeling of riding a real behemoth to the hilt.

item.name: Omnium Beast: Cockpit
item.description:
A comfy cabin that jolts when moving?

The workers on the drilling rig probably missed something.

item.name: Omnium Beast: Left Arm
item.description:
An Omnium-powered left arm of the cyberbeast. Please remain in your cabin and do not ride on the arm.

A gift from Bai Ling for those proficient in puzzle-solving in the shelter.

item.name: Omnium Beast: Right Arm
item.description:
An Omnium-powered right arm of the cyberbeast. Please remain in your cabin and do not ride on the arm.

Behemoths wandering Banges, Navia, and Crown are probably equipped with it. Low-probability drop from Behemoth - Surtur, Behemoth - Bergelmir, Behemoth - Fárbauti, Behemoth - Mimir, and Behemoth - Utgarda.

Low-probability drop from Raging Horn: Sergey in Vera: Rock Pillar Gobi, and from Bugle: Garrette in Vera: Quicksand Belt.

Mount11.name: Voyager
Mount11.description: Do you long for spontaneous trips? If you can name the location, the Voyager will be your best companion, carrying you over any terrain like it's perfectly flat.

item.name: Voyager Engine
item.description:
"Voyager exclusive!" the user manual warns in a bright font. But it's almost never seen with the component.

The workers on the drilling rig probably missed something.

item.name: Voyager Thruster
item.description:
Compact and versatile with all the essential parts... Actually, every part is essential.

The Four Powers in the Navia region could carry it. Low-probability drop from Four Powers - Okka, Four Powers - Hethlu, Four Powers - Smoli, and Four Powers - Sendyrs.

Low-probability drop from Blast Rock: Fafnir in Vera: Rock Pillar Gobi, and from Boom Rock: Tungchro in Vera: Quicksand Belt.

item.name: Voyager Control Station
item.description:
Control room for the Voyager. It compels you to shout "Onward!" for some reason.

The Heirs of Aida hid stuff in their stronghold on the dock.

item.name: Voyager Hull
item.description:
The first thing you'll want to do is give it a new paint job...

Hykros researchers would leave practical tools in the Ecological Stations in Navia.

Mount4.name: Monocross
Mount4.description: A vehicle designed and named based on the composite knowledge of several ancient alien beasts. The short self-defense blade on the head was initially a heavily promoted selling point, but was actually rarely used. Most people bought it for the appearance that combined natural wildness and technology.

item.name: Unicorn Power Core
item.description:
This vehicle engine is patent-pending, so no reverse engineering.

You might find something around the marvelous ore.

item.name: Unicorn Bionic Frame
item.description:
Hykros scholars once had a big fight over the material choice for bionics. The two sides submitted their own papers... So did the side with more papers win?

The dawn of new grounds for the Aida Bastion has come.

item.name: Unicorn Cyberlimbs
item.description:
"Cyberlimbs are cool!"... Wonder how many people that slogan will draw to buy the Monocross.

It's probably exhausting hauling boxes up the tower in Saag Passage.

item.name: Unicorn Head
item.description:
The head is armed with a defensive dagger, which is often treated as an accessory, hence the "Unicorn" moniker. I wonder how the creator feels about that.

Devotees of the Hyenas in the Crown region might carry it. Low-probability drop from Devotee Noah and Devotee Eber.

Low-probability drop from Gilded: Abela in Vera: Sandstorm Grounds, and from Sacred Gold: Carrandi in Vera: Rock Pillar Gobi.

Mount5.name: Dust Wheeler
Mount5.description: Crude and eye-catching. If it's presence and personality you're after, look no further. However, since someone noticed its antennae looks like little feelers, everyone started to think it was rather cute, which attracted more buyers.

item.name: Dust Wheeler
item.description: Crude and eye-catching. If it's presence and personality you're after, look no further. However, since someone noticed its antennae look like little feelers, everyone started to think it was rather cute, which in turn attracted more buyers. Duplicates are converted to 100 dark crystals and 20,000 gold.

Mount13.description: A unique cube-shaped vehicle. The in-built floating power unit allows it to move easily even on bumpy roads. However, its flashy tape lights make it looks like a moving disco light and particularly obvious during the night.

item.description:
Complete the mission Franz's Gift to use.
A unique cube-shaped vehicle. Its built-in floating power unit allows it to move easily, even on bumpy roads. However, its flashy tape lights make it looks like a moving disco ball, and it is particularly obvious at night.

Mount14.name: Heavy Engine
Mount14.description: A batch of retro yet high-tech heavy-duty engines reclaimed from the ruins of an auto plant. Lighthouse R&D's modifications enable them to speed over winding roads and counterstrike gorgers.

item.name: Heavy Engine
item.description: A batch of retro yet high-tech heavy engines reclaimed from the ruins of an auto plant. Lighthouse R&D's modifications enable them to speed over winding roads and counterstrike gorgers.

Mount7.name: Mechbird
Mount7.description:
A New vehicle designed and built by Cobalt-B that is both fun and practical.
Cobalt-B had some rather unique names planned, but the marketing department put the kibosh on it: an easy-to-remember name is a good name.

item.name: Mechbird: Head
item.description: "Want me to design the new vehicle? Okay, first, the child-like exterior will attract attention..."

item.name: Mechbird: Torso
item.description: "Trunk space or the radio... I don't want to give up either one..."

item.name: Mechbird: Legs
item.description: "It won't crumble even under a truckload of fallen fruit. Probably."

item.name: Mechbird: Core
item.description: "The newest creation from R&D. I had the kid try it out, and it's surprisingly comfortable."

Mount6.name: Crimson Meteor
Mount6.description:
Glamorous! Radiant! It's the brightest crimson star in your vehicle collection!
Note: Crimson Meteor cannot hit triple speed. Please drive carefully.

Mount8.name: Aidan Knight
Mount8.description: Although this motorcycle is small, it is wholly equipped. Low cost, energy-efficient, with sufficient storage space, it is not only an excellent choice for couriers, but has become popular among traveling merchants in recent years.

item.name: Aidan Knight
item.description: Although this motorcycle is small, it is wholly equipped. Low cost, energy-efficient, with sufficient storage space, it is not only an excellent choice for couriers, but has become popular among traveling merchants in recent years.

Mount12.name: "Jerboa"
Mount12.description: A light single-person vehicle with a built-in mini anti-gravity engine in the car body. Due to its simple structure and fairly stable performance, it is widely used for surface exploration purposes.

item.name: Jerboa Chassis
item.description: Made of special alloy, it is lightweight but solid. Its super strength makes it the ideal option for a variety of environments.

item.name: Jerboa Power Core
item.description: The power core was developed with cutting-edge energy technology. You never need to worry about the risk of your vehicle breaking down halfway.

Mount15.name: Desert Rider
Mount15.description: A vehicle for two, designed with bionics and ergonomics in mind. Ride with a companion to kill time while zooming through the scorching desert.

item.name: Desert Rider
item.description: A vehicle for two, designed with bionics and ergonomics in mind. Ride with a companion to kill time while zooming through the scorching desert.

Mount12_t.name: Jerboa Itasha
Mount12_t.description: A light single-person vehicle with a built-in mini anti-gravity engine in the car body. Due to its simple structure and fairly stable performance, it is widely used for surface exploration purposes.

Mount16.name: Warcart of Tomorrow
Mount16.description: Once it accelerates to 888 miles per hour, it can break through the time barrier and go to any time period...

item.name: Warcart of Tomorrow
item.description: Once it accelerates to 888 miles per hour, it can break through the time barrier and go to any time period...

Mount17.name: "Nova"
Mount17.description: Full of innocence and creativity! Enjoy your ride!

item.name: Nova Engine
item.description: Don't underestimate its horsepower based on its cute appearance!

item.name: Nova Base
item.description: A three-wheeled design, stable and safe. Great for travel, food delivery, cargo transportation, and household essentials!

item.name: Nova Hull
item.description: I have to admit that this thing looks like a toy, but it's totally a different story on the manual...

MountRacing1.name: Thunder Roar
MountRacing1.description: When its engine roared and it sped away, there was only one sound left ringing in the ears of the crowd: Thunder.

item.name: Thunder Roar
item.description: When its engine roared and it sped away, there was only one sound left ringing in the ears of the crowd: Thunder.

Mount18.name: Rapid Propulsion
Mount18.description: A popular vehicle in Aesperia, featuring outstanding acceleration and shock absorption systems. The bold paintwork on its wheels seems to emphasize the owner's unrestrained personality.

item.name: Rapid Propulsion
item.description: A popular vehicle in Aesperia, featuring outstanding acceleration and shock absorption systems. The bold paintwork on its wheels seems to emphasize the owner's unrestrained personality.

MountRacing2.name: Mammoth
MountRacing2.description: This superb car resembles a rushing mammoth when traversing treacherous terrain at high speeds.

MountWater1.name: Diamond Wings
MountWater1.description: This solo underwater propulsion device was developed by the Innars Department of Science and Technology. It is also nicknamed the "underwater jerboa" by many in Vera.

item.name: Diamond Wings: Engine
item.description: The engine of Diamond Wings, the solo underwater thruster. It is one of the core components.

item.name: Diamond Wings: Frame
item.description: The frame of Diamond Wings, the solo underwater thruster. It is one of the core components.

item.name: Diamond Wings: Booster Fin
item.description: Booster fin of Diamond Wings, the solo underwater thruster. It is one of the core components.

MountWater2.name: Vision Sphere
MountWater2.description: The cabin is small but very comfortable. It is recommended for those who want to float with the waves like a jellyfish and enjoy the sea view. Not for those prone to seasickness...

item.name: Vision Sphere: Cabin
item.description: The view is good, but it's better to add a device to scrape off the seaweed that sticks on the window...

item.name: Vision Sphere: Engine
item.description: In fact, when resurfacing, it doesn't contract like a jellyfish every once in a while... It's a machine, after all.

MountWater3.name: Sunfish
MountWater3.description: The way it moves through the water is lithe and graceful, almost as if it were flying through the sky. Its delicate design allows it to move efficiently without disturbing undersea creatures.

item.name: Sunfish
item.description: The way it swims by propelling through the water is lithe and graceful like gliding in the air. Its delicate design allows it to move efficiently without disturbing the undersea creatures.

MountWater5.name: Drifter
MountWater5.description: Suitable for calm water, looking very comfortable as it moves quickly while drawing beautiful ripples. It can also handle certain wind speeds and waves. (Only usable on water and the ocean.)

item.name: Drifter
item.description: Suitable for calm water, looking very comfortable as it moves quickly while drawing beautiful ripples. It can also handle certain wind speeds and waves. (Only usable on water and the ocean.)

MountWater6.name: Tamed Dragon-neck
MountWater6.description: Domesticated dragon-necked turtles are free to cruise about the Deep Sea. The spines on their shells go through a procedure to ensure that there is no longer any poison to pose any sort of risk.

item.name: Tamed Dragon-neck
item.description: Domesticated dragon-necked turtles are free to cruise about the Deep Sea. The spines on their shells go through a procedure to ensure that there is no longer any poison to pose any risk. Can only be used in the Deep Sea.

Mount19.name: Enigmatic Stag
Mount19.description: A vehicle designed based on deer that takes in energy through timestamps. Due to its four-legged design, it can adapt to the terrain in Domain 9 very well, with the only downside being the bumpy ride experience.

item.name: Enigmatic Stag
item.description: Prototyped after a deer, this vehicle can be powered and piloted through the use of timestamp energy. Its four-legged design renders it well-suited for the mountainous terrain of Domain 9, with the trade-off being a rather bumpy ride.

Mount21.name: Tamed Tricoon
Mount21.description: A tricoon tamed from a young age. It is gentle and docile, and can be used as a mount. It is highly intelligent and can understand some human language with training, making it an excellent companion.

item.name: Tamed Tricoon
item.description: A tricoon tamed from a young age. It is gentle and docile, and can be used as a mount. It is highly intelligent and can understand some human language with training, making it an excellent companion.

Mount20.name: Bionic Hornmane
Mount20.description: A byproduct of the research in the Department of Yuheng. Created through genetic engineering using the biometrics obtained from the Darkness creature during combat. However, it only shares the look of the creature. In fact, it won't attack humans at all, and some people even use it as a mount.

item.name: Taming Bell
item.description: Necessary for controlling Bionic Hornmanes. Through this device, the hornmane gains the ability to understand and obey instructions.

item.name: Hornmane: Power Core
item.description: Auxiliary exoskeleton energy source of the Bionic Hornmane. Improves durability upon installation.

Mount6_sony.name: Starlit Cosmos
Mount6_sony.description: Manufactured using Hykros's latest technology, this high-power engine motorbike is a necessity that can only be obtained through limited means.

MountRacing3.name: Bluefrost Bloom
MountRacing3.description: A confidential product from Hykros's Vehicle Research Lab. It incorporates some of the latest technology, which still requires testing. Can only be claimed via limited means.

item.name: Bluefrost Bloom
item.description: A confidential product from Hykros's Vehicle Research Lab. It incorporates some of the latest technology, which still requires testing. Can only be claimed via limited means.

Mount22.name: Floating Bubble
Mount22.description: Soft, light, and most importantly, it's gorgeous!

item.name: Floating Bubble Shard
item.description: Soft, light, and most importantly, it's gorgeous!

Mount23.name: Ink Fox
Mount23.description: A tamed ink fox, bright, adorable, and very approachable. It can be mounted.

item.name: Ink Fox
item.description: A tamed ink fox, bright, adorable, and very approachable. It can be mounted.

Mount24.name: Cyox
Mount24.description: The branches twining around a tamed cyox are partially retracted. It can be used as a vehicle.

item.name: Taming Potion Pack
item.description: A scientific research achievement of the Wildlife Research Institute. Users of this potion tend to become docile.

Mount25.name: Archeagle
Mount25.description: A tamed archeagle, gentle and no longer aggressive. Can be used as a vehicle.

MountWater7.name: Phantom Dolphin
MountWater7.description: A tamed phantom dolphin, very friendly to humans and fond of playing with them in the sea. Can be used as a vehicle.

Mount26.name: Wondrous Vessel
Mount26.description: A vehicle developed using the latest research findings of the Department of Yuheng, featuring a unique curved body and a smooth driving experience on top of the distinctive back push from the field energy-powered engine. Shift the gear to the highest and prepare your ears for the thunderous roar of the exhaust pipe.

item.name: Wondrous Vessel
item.description: A vehicle developed using the latest research findings of the Department of Yuheng, featuring a unique curved body and a smooth driving experience on top of the distinctive back push from the field energy-powered engine. Shift the gear to the highest and prepare your ears for the thunderous roar of the exhaust pipe.

Mount8_t.name: Dream Star
Mount8_t.description: Bleep-bleep! Now let me talk about how it works! It uses the most precious gem in the universe as its engine—the friendship gem! It is specially designed to travel between different domains, and all powered by just the love and hope in your heart!

Mount28.name: Coaster
Mount28.description: "Please, no more calling me a hamster ball! Can't you see my rockin' hairstyle? I'm Coaster! Call me Coaster!" the vehicle's built-in AI roars.

item.name: Coaster
item.description: "Please, no more calling me a hamster ball! Can't you see my rockin' hairstyle? I'm Coaster! Call me Coaster!" the vehicle's built-in AI roars.

Mount29.name: Shrooman
Mount29.description: A tamed Shrooman, a rideable marvel. Its plush mushroom cap provides a soft and cozy journey, but beware of occasional spore explosions.

Mount30.name: Swift Raptor
Mount30.description: A new type of vehicle developed based on the ancient creatures of the human home planet. As the name suggests, it is fast and fierce upon activation, so riders must make sure to press the foot pedals tightly and grasp the handle tightly to avoid falling.
